ARABIC: إِنَّا قَدْ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْنَآ أَنَّ ٱلْعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It has been revealed to us that punishment is for him who denies the truth and turns away.'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It has been revealed to us that punishment will befall him who denies and turns away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It has been revealed to us that chastisement awaits those who called the lie to the truth and turned away from it.' "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is revealed to us that those who call our message a lie or turn away from it will face the torment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘It has indeed been revealed to us that the punishment is upon the one who denies and turns away.’”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: `Truly, it has been revealed to us that the torment will be for him who denies, and turns away.`"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely it has been revealed to us that the chastisement will surely come upon him who rejects and turns back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It has been revealed to us that chastisement shall light upon him who cries lies and turns his back."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! it hath been revealed unto us that the doom will be for him who denieth and turneth away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: it has been revealed to us that punishment shall overtake him who rejects it and turns away!'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! it hath been revealed unto us that the torment will be for him who belieth and turneth away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed it has been revealed to us that punishment shall befall those who impugn us and turn their backs [on us].’’ ’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily it has been revealed to us that the Penalty (awaits) those who reject and turn away.'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Truly, it has been revealed to us that the torment will be for him who denies [believes not in the Oneness of Allah, and in His Messengers, etc.], and turns away.'(from the truth and obedience of Allah)"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is revealed to us that a punishment will fall on those who belie and turn away."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It was revealed to us that the punishment falls upon him who disbelieves and turns away.'“
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it has been revealed to us that the punishment will be upon whoever denies and turns away.' "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:48] Indeed it has been revealed to us that the chastisement shall befall him who denies, [the truth of] what we have brought, and turns away” ’, [and who] rejects it. And so they came to him and said [to him] all of what has been mentioned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! it hath been revealed unto us that the) continuous (doom will be for him who denieth) God's divine Oneness (and turneth away) from faith.
